```{r} 
#GGPUBR LEARN
ggplot(dane, aes(wydg,dochg)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = lm) +
  stat_cor(method = "pearson", label.x = 20)
```

```{r}
ggboxplot(dane,x="woj", y="dochg",
          title = "Polish lands and expenses",
          color="woj",palette = "rainbow")

ggboxplot(dane,x="woj",
          y=c("dochg","wydg","d36"),
          title=c("dochg","wydg","d36"),
          ylab="Expression",
          color="woj",palette = "rainbow")

ggdensity(dane,
       x = c("trb", "klm",  "d36"),
       y = "..density..",
       combine = TRUE,                
       xlab = "Expression", 
       add = "median",                  
       rug = TRUE) 

ggdensity(dane,
       x = c("wydg", "dochg"),
       y = "..count..",
       color =".x.", fill = ".x.",
       facet.by = "woj",
       merge = TRUE,          
       xlab = "Expression",
       add = "median",                
       rug = TRUE ,                 
       palette = "jco"                  
)
```
